key_points: Prince Harry and Meghan will serve as campaign chairs for Global Citizen's vaccination effort.
They will appear at 'Vax Live: The Concert to Reunite the World' on May 8.
The event aims to deliver COVID-19 vaccines to medical workers in poor countries.
President Joe Biden, Vice President Kamala Harris, and leaders from France, Canada, and Croatia will also appear.
The concert is part of the 'We Can Do This' initiative to increase vaccine confidence.
Harry and Meghan's effort includes raising money for COVAX to fund vaccines for medical workers.
Global Citizen aims to encourage business and G7 countries to donate and share vaccines.
60 nations had not received any COVID-19 vaccines as of April, according to Global Citizen CEO Hugh Evans.
Celebrities will urge pharmaceutical companies to offer vaccines at not-for-profit prices.
The event will feature performances and appearances by global celebrities and aims for equitable vaccine distribution.
